BG.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
BG.description: Flipnote Studio 3D is an exclusive free download for members of My Nintendo to celebrate the launch of the service. In order to become a member and download it, you first need to create a Nintendo Account at https://accounts.nintendo.com. You have to do this either by signing in there with the Nintendo Network ID you use on your Nintendo 3DS system, or by linking that Nintendo Network ID in your Nintendo Account settings after the registration. Then just visit the Flipnote Studio 3D product page on the official Nintendo website while being signed in with your Nintendo Account, and you'll find the software ready to download to your Nintendo 3DS system. This offer is valid only until 30 April 2016, after which the software will become unavailable for download. You must be 13 years of age or older in order to register a Nintendo Account. Flipnote Studio 3D is a free drawing application that allows you to create your very own animated masterpieces. Whether you want to scribble quick notes or draw sketches, you’ll never run out of pages with Flipnote Studio 3D. There are a whole host of tools that will let you bring your creations to life and create high-quality animations. You can then share these creations with friends and users from around the world so everyone can be wowed by your talents.

AT.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
AT.description: Flipnote Studio 3D ist ein exklusiver Download für Mitglieder von My Nintendo zur Feier des Servicestarts. Um Mitglied zu werden und die Software herunterladen zu können, musst du zunächst einen Nintendo-Account auf https://accounts.nintendo.com erstellen. Dazu musst du dich dort entweder mit der Nintendo Network ID anmelden, die du auf deinem Nintendo 3DS-System verwendest, oder dich mit dieser Nintendo Network ID nach der Registrierung in den Nintendo-Account-Einstellungen verbinden. Besuche danach einfach die Produktseite von Flipnote Studio 3D auf der offiziellen Nintendo-Webseite, während du mit deinem Nintendo-Account angemeldet bist. Dort wird dann die Software für dich zum Download auf dein Nintendo 3DS-System bereitstehen. Dieses Angebot ist bis zum 30. April 2016 gültig. Danach wird die Software nicht mehr zum Download zur Verfügung stehen. Um einen Nintendo-Account einrichten zu können, musst du mindestens 13 Jahre alt sein. Flipnote Studio 3D ist eine kostenlose Zeichenanwendung, mit der du deine eigenen animierten Meisterwerke erstellen kannst. Egal, ob du nur kurze Notizen festhalten oder Skizzen anfertigen möchtest: In Flipnote Studio 3D geht dir nie das Papier aus. Es gibt eine Vielzahl an Tools, mit denen du deine Entwürfe zum Leben erwecken und eindrucksvolle Animationen erstellen kannst. Anschließend kannst du deine Werke dann mit Freunden oder sogar Benutzern aus aller Welt teilen und alle mit deinem Talent beeindrucken.

AU.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
AU.description: Flipnote Studio 3D is an exclusive free download for members of My Nintendo to celebrate the launch of the service. In order to become a member and download it, you first need to create a Nintendo Account at https://accounts.nintendo.com. You have to do this either by signing in there with the Nintendo Network ID you use on your Nintendo 3DS system, or by linking that Nintendo Network ID in your Nintendo Account settings after the registration. Then just visit the Flipnote Studio 3D product page on the official Nintendo website while being signed in with your Nintendo Account, and you'll find the software ready to download to your Nintendo 3DS system. This offer is valid only until 30 April 2016, after which the software will become unavailable for download. You must be 13 years of age or older in order to register a Nintendo Account. Flipnote Studio 3D is a free drawing application that allows you to create your very own animated masterpieces. Whether you want to scribble quick notes or draw sketches, you’ll never run out of pages with Flipnote Studio 3D. There are a whole host of tools that will let you bring your creations to life and create high-quality animations. You can then share these creations with friends and users from around the world so everyone can be wowed by your talents.

BE.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
BE.description: Flipnote Studio 3D est un téléchargement exclusif et gratuit pour les membres du programme My Nintendo, afin de célébrer le lancement du service. Afin de devenir membre et d'avoir accès au téléchargement, vous devez d'abord créer un compte Nintendo sur le site https://accounts.nintendo.com. Vous pouvez créer un compte Nintendo en vous connectant sur ce site avec l'identifiant Nintendo Network que vous utilisez sur votre console Nintendo 3DS, ou en associant l'identifiant Nintendo Network dans les paramètres de votre compte Nintendo après l'inscription. Ensuite, il vous suffira de vous connecter à votre compte Nintendo et de visiter la page de Flipnote Studio 3D. Le logiciel pourra alors être téléchargé sur votre console Nintendo 3DS. Cette offre est valide jusqu'au 30 avril 2016 uniquement, après quoi le logiciel ne pourra plus être téléchargé. Vous devez avoir au moins 13 ans pour pouvoir créer un compte Nintendo. Flipnote Studio 3D est une application gratuite qui vous permet de créer vos propres chef d'œuvre animés. Vous pouvez l'utiliser pour prendre des notes rapidement ou dessiner des esquisses, sans jamais être à court de feuilles. Une large palette d'outils vous permet de donner vie à vos œuvres et de créer des animations de qualité. Vous pouvez ensuite les partager avec vos amis ou avec d'autres utilisateurs dans le monde pour leur faire part de vos talents.

ES.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
ES.description: Con motivo del lanzamiento del servicio, Flipnote Studio 3D está disponible como descarga gratuita en exclusiva para los miembros de My Nintendo. Para ser miembro y poder descargar este programa, en primer lugar deberás crear una cuenta Nintendo en https://accounts.nintendo.com. Para ello, necesitarás iniciar sesión con el mismo Nintendo Network ID que utilices en tu consola Nintendo 3DS, o vincular tu Nintendo Network ID en la configuración de tu cuenta Nintendo una vez que te hayas registrado. A continuación, visita la página de Flipnote Studio 3D en el sitio web oficial de Nintendo iniciando sesión con tu cuenta Nintendo y encontrarás el programa listo para descargar en tu consola Nintendo 3DS. Esta oferta solo es válida hasta el 30 de abril de 2016. Después de esta fecha, el programa ya no podrá descargarse. Para poder crear una cuenta Nintendo es necesario tener como mínimo 13 años. Flipnote Studio 3D es una aplicación de dibujo gratuita que te permite crear tus propias obras de animación. Puedes escribir notas al vuelo o dibujar bocetos. Lo que quieras, ¡en Flipnote Studio 3D nunca te vas a quedar sin hojas! Y tienes un montón de herramientas que te ayudarán a crear animaciones de gran calidad. Después puedes compartir tus creaciones con amigos y usuarios de todo el mundo, para dejarles admirados con tu talento.

NL.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
NL.description: Flipnote Studio 3D is een exclusieve gratis download voor leden van My Nintendo om de launch van de dienst te vieren. Om lid te worden en het te downloaden, moet je eerst een Nintendo-account aanmaken op https://accounts.nintendo.com. Zorg ervoor dat je inlogt met de Nintendo Network ID die je gebruikt op je Nintendo 3DS-systeem, of koppel je Nintendo Network ID in je Nintendo-account instellingen nadat je een Nintendo-account hebt aangemaakt. Ga vervolgens na de Flipnote Studio 3D-productpagina op de officiële Nintendo website terwijl je ingelogd bent met je Nintendo-account, en de software zal voor je klaarstaan om naar je Nintendo 3DS-systeem te worden gedownload. Deze aanbieding is geldig tot en met 30 april 2016, daarna zal de software niet langer beschikbaar zijn om te downloaden. Je moet 13 jaar of ouder zijn om een Nintendo-account aan te maken. Flipnote Studio 3D is een gratis tekenprogramma, waarmee je je eigen geanimeerde meesterwerken kunt maken. Of je nu een snelle aantekening maakt of schetst, met Flipnote Studio 3D zit je nooit zonder papier. Met een schat aan gereedschappen kun je je creaties tot leven wekken en animaties van hoge kwaliteit ontwerpen. Vervolgens kun je indruk maken met je talenten door je creaties te delen met vrienden en gebruikers uit de hele wereld.

LU.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D

Flipnote Studio 3D est une application gratuite qui vous permet de créer vos propres chef d'œuvre animés. IT.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
IT.description: Per festeggiare il lancio del servizio, My Nintendo rilascia Flipnote Studio 3D, un esclusivo software scaricabile gratuito per i membri di My Nintendo. Per diventare un membro e scaricarlo, devi prima creare un account Nintendo all'indirizzo https://accounts.nintendo.com. Puoi farlo in due modi: visitando il sito ed effettuando l'accesso con il Nintendo Network ID che usi sulla tua console Nintendo 3DS, oppure registrando un nuovo Nintendo Network ID e collegandolo nelle impostazioni del tuo account Nintendo. Una volta effettuato l'accesso, è sufficiente visitare la pagina di Flipnote Studio 3D sul sito ufficiale Nintendo: troverai il software pronto da scaricare sulla tua console Nintendo 3DS. L'offerta è valida fino al 30 aprile 2016, dopodiché il software non sarà più disponibile per essere scaricato. Per creare un account Nintendo devi avere almeno 13 anni. Flipnote Studio 3D è un'applicazione di disegno gratuita che ti permette di creare fantastiche animazioni personalizzate. Se ti piace prendere appunti veloci, fare schizzi o creare disegni più elaborati, in Flipnote Studio 3D le pagine non finiscono mai! Inoltre, ci sono tantissimi strumenti per dare vita alle tue creazioni trasformandole in animazioni di alta qualità. Potrai quindi condividere le tue animazioni con i tuoi amici e con utenti di tutto il mondo per far conoscere a tutti il tuo talento!

SK.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
SK.description: Flipnote Studio 3D is an exclusive free download for members of My Nintendo to celebrate the launch of the service. In order to become a member and download it, you first need to create a Nintendo Account at https://accounts.nintendo.com. You have to do this either by signing in there with the Nintendo Network ID you use on your Nintendo 3DS system, or by linking that Nintendo Network ID in your Nintendo Account settings after the registration. Then just visit the Flipnote Studio 3D product page on the official Nintendo website while being signed in with your Nintendo Account, and you'll find the software ready to download to your Nintendo 3DS system. This offer is valid only until 30 April 2016, after which the software will become unavailable for download. You must be 13 years of age or older in order to register a Nintendo Account. Flipnote Studio 3D is a free drawing application that allows you to create your very own animated masterpieces. Whether you want to scribble quick notes or draw sketches, you’ll never run out of pages with Flipnote Studio 3D. There are a whole host of tools that will let you bring your creations to life and create high-quality animations. You can then share these creations with friends and users from around the world so everyone can be wowed by your talents.

RU.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
RU.description: В качестве подарка к запуску сервиса My Nintendo, программа Flipnote Studio 3D доступна для загрузки бесплатно и только для подписчиков сервиса. Для того чтобы подписаться и загрузить программу, вам нужно создать учетную запись Nintendo на https://accounts.nintendo.com. Вы сможете это сделать, войдя в систему вышеуказанного вебсайта, используя код Nintendo Network, который вы используете на вашей системе Nintendo 3DS, или же связав этот код Nintendo Network в настройках вашей учетной записи Nintendo после регистрации. После чего, пока вы находитесь в системе, используя вашу учетную запись Nintendo, откройте страницу Flipnote Studio 3D на официальном вебсайте Nintendo, где вы найдете эту программу, готовую для загрузки на вашу систему Nintendo 3DS. Это предложение действительно до 30 апреля 2016. По окончании предложения, эта программа больше не будет доступна для загрузки. Для того чтобы зарегистрировать вашу учетную запись Nintendo, вы должны быть от 13 и старше. Flipnote Studio 3D ─ бесплатное* приложение для рисования, которое позволяет вам создавать свои собственные анимационные шедевры. В нем можно как написать рукописные заметки, так и нарисовать наброски, а богатый инструментарий позволит вам оживить свои творения и создать из них высококачественный анимационный ролик. Затем вы сможете поделиться этим роликом с друзьями и игроками со всего мира, чтобы все могли оценить ваш талант по достоинству.

PT.name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
PT.description: Para celebrar o lançamento do serviço, Flipnote Studio 3D está agora disponível para download gratuito e exclusivo para membros My Nintendo. Para se poder tornar membro e fazer o download do serviço, terá primeiro de criar uma conta Nintendo em https://accounts.nintendo.com. Poderá fazê-lo iniciando a sessão com a mesma Nintendo Network ID que usa na sua Consola Nintendo 3DS, ou, em alternativa, vinculando a sua Nintendo Network ID com as configurações da sua conta Nintendo, após o registo. Depois, visite a página web dos produtos Flipnote Studio 3D na página oficial da Nintendo, mantendo a sessão iniciada com a sua conta Nintendo, e a aplicação estará pronta para ser descarregada para a sua Consola Nintendo 3DS. Esta oferta é válida até 30 de abril de 2016. Depois desta data, a aplicação deixará de estar disponível para download. Deverá ter treze anos, ou mais, para criar a sua conta Nintendo. O Flipnote Studio 3D é uma aplicação gratuita que te permite criar as tuas próprias obras de arte animadas. Quer queiras esboçar notas rápidas ou fazer desenhos mais elaborados, nunca se te acabarão as páginas em Flipnote Studio 3D! Existe um grande número de ferramentas que te permitem dar vida aos teus desenhos para que se tornem animações de alta qualidade. Estas podem depois ser partilhadas com amigos e utilizadores de todo o mundo para que toda a gente possa testemunhar o teu talento!
